abstract: Sets the insert action for the dynamic table rows.

declaration.code: func dropDestination<T>(for payloadType: T.Type = T.self, action: @escaping (Int, [T]) -> Void) -> ModifiedContent<Self, OnInsertTableRowModifier> where T : Transferable

overview:
## Return Value

A view that calls `action` when elements are inserted into the original view.
